docs.snippet: Ligue 1 leaders Monaco won 2-1 at Montpellier on Tuesday while second-placed Paris St Germain snatched a last-gasp winner to edge Lille by the same scoreline after goalkeeper Alphonse Areola's error looked to have cost them victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ligue 1 leaders Monaco won 2-1 at Montpellier on Tuesday while second-placed Paris St Germain snatched a last-gasp winner to edge Lille by the same scoreline after goalkeeper Alphonse Areola's error looked to have cost them victory.

headline.main: Monaco Beat Montpellier 2-1, PSG Grab Late Win Over Lille
headline.print_headline: Monaco Beat Montpellier 2-1, PSG Grab Late Win Over Lille
